attributes.action: Give RSA farmers dispensation to apply for fast track asylum, in light of events
attributes.background: The South African National Assembly passed a motion to examine the expropriation of land without compensation. This would deprive many South Africans of their property, homes and livelihoods. It would also limit their ability to migrate and start afresh. Help these people make a new home in the UK.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "dispensation to apply for fast track asylum".

People can already claim asylum if they have left their country and are unable to go back because they fear persecution.

You can find out more:

https://www.gov.uk/claim-asylum
